meanings.definition: To remove or reduce feminine qualities or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: She defeminized her wardrobe by donating all her dresses.
meanings.sent2: The artist defeminized the portrait by giving the subject a more neutral expression.
meanings.sent3: The cat defeminized the room by knocking over all the pink decorations.
meanings.sent4: The storm defeminized the landscape, stripping the flowers of their delicate petals.
meanings.sent5: The chef defeminized the dish by adding more savory spices and less floral garnishes.

meanings.definition: To make less feminine in nature or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The company defeminized their marketing campaign to appeal to a broader audience.
meanings.sent2: The haircut defeminized her look, giving her a more edgy style.
meanings.sent3: The comedian defeminized the joke by removing the stereotypical punchline.
meanings.sent4: The artist defeminized the sculpture, opting for sharp angles instead of soft curves.
meanings.sent5: The teacher defeminized the classroom decor, choosing neutral colors over pastels.
